name: The Gentle Drift
description:
An introspective journey halfway between The Stanley Parable and The Beginners Guide.

Overview

[FRENCH & ENGLISH LOCALISATION]

The game is a first person storytelling game which I hope will reflect your personal thoughts.

The game lasts 5 minutes, so I don't want to say too much about the story and prefer you to experience the whole thing in one fell swoop.

The game reflects what I've been through and what I'm still going through in my life. The work of introspection on what I wanted to do in my life as well as the lack of its meaning struck me. I opened a video game engine for the first time two months ago and I have not stopped working on this personal project in order to be able to transcribe my thoughts.

I don't know if the game will appeal to everyone, but I'd be happy if I hit at least one unknown person.

Thank you for taking the time to try my game, it is very valuable to me.
